text: Welcome to part 11 playbook. As per usual, I want you to go and find the strategies, the trend strategies we've spoken about in part 11, being the day 2 trend, the trend day and the engulfing profile and value area, and I want you to go and find those in the markets listed below. Again. Don't forget to take your time. Really enjoy not just finding these strategies, but really enjoy learning them and finally grasping some real basic strategies that you can add to your arsenal and hopefully begin to become more profitable. Good luck and I look forward to seeing you all in part 12.
